overview: This charming collection from animators John and Faith Hubley showcases their unique creative vision, turning traditional children's cartoons into an expressive art form. Volume 2 includes 10 shorts that explore everything from world mythology to temper tantrums: Seers and Clowns, Sky Dance, Cockaboody, Hello, Step by Step, Rainbows of Hawaii, The Big Bang and Other Creation Myths, Zuckerland!, Whither Weather and Her Grandmother's Gift.
title: Hubley Collection #2
